title: Europe is slapping tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles - for now. Here's what to know
description: EU raises customs duties on Chinese electric vehicles due to unfair subsidies. Tariffs aim to address market imbalance. Negotiations ongoing between EU and China. Concerns about impact on European jobs and green technology production. Uncertainty looms over potential solutions and retaliatory measures.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
